@Callanite @sallygrables Spam was food to survive on, giving combat soldiers protein & a large amount of calories (fat) they needed for hard physical activity. @sallygrables This is the idealized menu. More often they got just porridge or borshch. The field kitchens used their big kettle to cook stew too. The meat was whatever they could find, literally ‘pot luck.’
